name: DiagnosticMammographyStudy
title: Diagnostic Mammography Study
description: This value set is associated with the "Breast Cancer Screening Recall Rates" measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (OQR) Program. It is also referred to as "OP-39."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains HCPCS codes associated with diagnostic imaging studies used to identify breast cancer in men and women.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who underwent a diagnostic mammography.),(Inclusion Criteria: HCPCS codes that identify breast diagnostic imaging studies performed using traditional mammography are captured in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with breast diagnostic are excluded from this value set. Similarly, codes from alternative terminologies other than CPT are excluded from this value set.)

concept.display: Computer-aided detection, including computer algorithm analysis of breast mri image data for lesion detection/characterization, pharmacokinetic analysis, with further physician review for interpretation (list separately in addition to code for primary procedure)

contains.display: Computer-aided detection, including computer algorithm analysis of breast mri image data for lesion detection/characterization, pharmacokinetic analysis, with further physician review for interpretation (list separately in addition to code for primary procedure)
